questions.question: If the root -mot- means "move," which is NOT the correct usage of motivate?

choices.answer: My teacher motivates me to do well on my midterm exam.
I motivated the ducks to cross the road.
She felt motivated so she did not do well on her exam.
Mrs. Britton motivated the class by bribing them with candy.

questions.question: If the root -mens- means measure, which is NOT the correct usage of dimension?

choices.answer: The dimensions of the room were 10x11.
We have to consider every dimension of the problem.
We traveled to every dimension of time and space.
I could not believe the dimension the fight caused between them!

questions.question: If the root -man- means hand, which is NOT the correct usage of manipulate?

choices.answer: We become defensive when we believe others are trying to manipulate us.
People were manipulated by Hitler's propaganda.
He was a manipulator -- soft, shy, and a follower.
The sculptors manipulate the clay with skill and speed.

questions.question: If the root -psych- means mind or spirit, which is NOT the correct usage of psychological?

choices.answer: The psychological effects of fear can last a long time.
The psychologist explained I need some physical therapy.
Psychological thrillers are very suspenseful movies.
My psychology teacher taught me about the different functions of the brain.

questions.question: If the root -spec- means look or see, which is NOT the correct usage of perspective?

choices.answer: The narrator's perspective was limited.
Reading a memoir about the holocaust has helped broaden my perspective.
Seeing things from others' perspective is hard sometimes.
The wedding cake's perspective was off -- it leaned a little to the left.
